subtitle: a supplication to the noble Lama Mahaguru Padmasambhava
title: Pluvial nectar of blessings
work_titles: Rje btsun bla ma ma hā gu ru Padma-ʼbyuṅ-gnas la gsol ba ʼdebs pa byin rlabs bdud rtsiʼi char rgyun.

by_statement: by His Holiness Ngag-dbang-blo-bzang-rgya-mtsho, the fifth Dalai Lama ; translated from the Tibetan with commentary by Dennis Cordell.
